About the Company: Established in 1898, by Shri Vallabh Pittie, SVP Group is primarily engaged in manufacturing of polyester, polyester & cotton blend, and 100% cotton yarn across 3 state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities in Jhalawar (Rajasthan), Ramnad (Coimbatore) and Sohar (Oman). Moving up the value chain, the company has augmented its product mix to manufacture 84% compact cotton yarn and 16% traditional yarn currently. Company has a vision to become a world-leading, fully integrated textile company in manufacturing yarn, fabric and garments while achieving leadership position in the compact cotton yarn.
